data.fullContent: Computer networks have transformed the way businesses communicate and interact with one another. In the past, many businesses had their own server and Internet connections. Today, businesses often connect to the same network as others to provide services and share information. Solutions such as cloud computing have become more popular in large part because of their cost-saving capabilities. Also, many businesses are now operating in the global marketplace, thus requiring a single consistent business platform that can accommodate a variety of locations, languages, and culture. As a result, cloud computing has become a reality in many organizations.

q1.translation: 计算机网络已经改变了企业之间交流和互动的方式。在过去，许多企业都有自己的服务器和互联网连接。
q1.front: Computer networks have transformed the way businesses communicate and interact with one another. In the past, many businesses had their own server and Internet connections.
q1.content: Computer networks have transformed the ____ businesses communicate and ____ with one another. In the past, many ____ had their ____ server and Internet connections.

q2.translation: 计算机网络已经改变了企业之间交流和互动的方式。在过去，许多企业都有自己的服务器和互联网连接。如今，企业经常连接到与其他企业相同的网络，以提供服务和共享信息。云计算等解决方案越来越受欢迎，在很大程度上是因为它们具有节省成本的功能。此外，许多企业现在都在全球市场上运营，因此需要一个能够适应各种地点、语言和文化的单一一致的业务平台。因此，云计算在许多组织中已经成为现实。
q2.front: Computer networks have transformed the way businesses communicate and interact with one another. In the past, many businesses had their own server and Internet connections.
q2.middle: Today, businesses often connect to the same network as others to provide services and share information.
q2.ending: Solutions such as cloud computing have become more popular in large part because of their cost-saving capabilities. Also, many businesses are now operating in the global marketplace, thus requiring a single consistent business platform that can accommodate a variety of locations, languages, and culture. As a result, cloud computing has become a reality in many organizations.

options.sentence: Today, businesses often connect to the same network as others to provide services and share information.
Typical tasks performed by a network administrator include configuring a device's settings and monitoring performance data.
Globalization can make your company more efficient and profitable, but it can also make your system vulnerable to loss.
Network management is a field of study that provides a framework for administering IT networks.

q3.questionContent: What is one advantage of cloud computing?

The internet was initially seen as a means of communication between people in different states.
Thanks to advances in computer networks, most businesses no longer need their own servers and network connections.
